entities: International Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia
summary:
11. Authorizes SFOR to take measures to ensure compliance with Annex 1-A and stresses parties' equal responsibility for compliance.

12. Authorizes Member States to take measures to defend SFOR or assist in its mission.

13. Authorizes measures to ensure compliance with airspace rules and procedures established by the SFOR Commander.

14. Requests cooperation from Bosnian authorities to manage airports effectively.

15. Demands respect for SFOR's security and freedom of movement.

16. Invites States to provide support and facilities for SFOR.

17. Recalls agreements on the status of forces and reminds parties of their obligations.

18. Requests regular reporting from Member States.

19. Welcomes the European Union's Police Mission (EUPM) deployment.

20. Requests the Secretary-General to submit reports on Peace Agreement implementation.

21. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
